Welcome to my personal website!

<p align="justify">
Lorenzo Belli is a PhD student in the **Department of Political and Social Sciences** at Universitat Pompeu Fabra (UPF). He holds a bachelor’s degree in Sociology from the Università di Bologna (UNIBO), a master’s degree in Sociology and Social Research with honours from the Università di Trento (UNITN), and a master’s degree in Sociology and Demography from UPF.

He is currently a member of the project *“Contextualized Multi-Intervention Strategies to Break the Vicious Cycle of Intimate Partner Violence”*, funded by the Agencia Estatal de Investigación and cofunded by the European Union.

His research interests focus on social and **gender inequalities**, as well as **gender-based violence**. This site presents his research, publications, and academic work. Visitors are welcome to explore and get in touch!
</p>
